descriptor.name: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension (IGNDP) Assignment
descriptor.short_desc: Assignment: Guide a beneficiary through IGNDPS application and document the process and learnings.
descriptor.long_desc:
Assignment Overview:
This assignment requires you to apply your knowledge of the Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme (IGNDPS) by simulating or assisting a beneficiary in applying for the scheme. Document each step, from eligibility check to application submission and benefit tracking.

  1. Task:
    Guide a real or hypothetical beneficiary through the IGNDPS application process, ensuring all requirements are met.
  2. Documentation:
    Record the steps, challenges, and solutions. Include forms or screenshots if possible.
  3. Reflection:
    Write a brief reflection on the importance of disability pension schemes and what you learned from this assignment.

Why Complete This Assignment:

  • Reinforce your practical knowledge of IGNDPS procedures.
  • Develop the ability to assist others in accessing social security schemes.
  • Prepare for real-world scenarios as a community facilitator or social worker.

descriptor.name: Haqdarshak
descriptor.short_desc: A social enterprise connecting citizens with their eligible government welfare schemes.
descriptor.long_desc: Haqdarshak is a tech platform that bridges the information and access gap between citizens and social protection services. We use an assisted-tech model with trained agents to provide last-mile support for discovering and applying for government and private welfare schemes.
